title: 219. Andy & DJ CTI: American Voting Rights, Doctors Vs. Podcasters & NCAA's Transgender Policy
itunes:title: 219. Andy & DJ CTI: American Voting Rights, Doctors Vs. Podcasters & NCAA's Transgender Policy
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Nick Saban urging Manchin to help pass the voting rights bill in West Virginia, the majority of the 270 doctors who signed the letter demanding Spotify take action against Joe Rogan not being actual doctors, and the NCAA changing its participation policy amid calls for reevaluation.
